query.name: client
query.description: ISV名称ISV：ISV-ISV英文或拼音名称、商家ERP：SELLER-商家英文或拼音名称

common.name: app_key
common.description: Unique app ID issued by LAZADA Open Platform console when you apply for an app category

common.name: timestamp
common.description: The time stamp of the request e.g. 1517820392000 (which translates to 5 February 2018 08:46:32) with less than 7200s difference from UTC time

common.name: sign_method
common.description: The HMAC hash algorithm you are using to calculate your signature

request_examples.code:
client = LazopApiClient::Client.new(url, appkey, appSecret)
request = LazopApiClient::Request.new('/logistics/cnpms/address/query')
request.add_api_parameter("country", "\u4E2D\u56FD")
request.add_api_parameter("zipCode", "3455657")
request.add_api_parameter("userInfo", "{\"appUserKey\":\"12345\"}")
request.add_api_parameter("city", "\u676D\u5DDE\u5E02")
request.add_api_parameter("remark", "\u5907\u6CE8")
request.add_api_parameter("locale", "zh_CN")
request.add_api_parameter("province", "\u6D59\u6C5F\u7701")
request.add_api_parameter("street", "\u848B\u6751\u8857\u9053")
request.add_api_parameter("district", "\u897F\u6E56\u533A")
request.add_api_parameter("detailAddress", "\u6587\u4E00\u897F\u8DEF\u897F\u6EAA\u9996\u5EA7")
request.add_api_parameter("client", "test")
response = client.execute(request, accessToken)
puts response.success?
puts response.body

client = lazop.LazopClient(url, appkey ,appSecret)
request = lazop.LazopRequest('/logistics/cnpms/address/query')
request.add_api_param('country', '\u4E2D\u56FD')
request.add_api_param('zipCode', '3455657')
request.add_api_param('userInfo', '{\"appUserKey\":\"12345\"}')
request.add_api_param('city', '\u676D\u5DDE\u5E02')
request.add_api_param('remark', '\u5907\u6CE8')
request.add_api_param('locale', 'zh_CN')
request.add_api_param('province', '\u6D59\u6C5F\u7701')
request.add_api_param('street', '\u848B\u6751\u8857\u9053')
request.add_api_param('district', '\u897F\u6E56\u533A')
request.add_api_param('detailAddress', '\u6587\u4E00\u897F\u8DEF\u897F\u6EAA\u9996\u5EA7')
request.add_api_param('client', 'test')
response = client.execute(request, access_token)
print(response.type)
print(response.body)
